events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn't fit and I would like to request a refund for it.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning refund and return.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket that the customer wants to return.
Hello! I'm here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return?
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the product is unused and in original packaging for processing the refund?
Thank you! The order number is 123456789. The jacket is unused and still in the original packaging, as I just tried it on once.
We have processed your return request. Please send the jacket back to our return center and once received, we will issue a full refund to your original payment method.
That's great, thanks for the quick response! I will send the jacket back today and let you know once it is shipped.
We have received the returned jacket and your refund has been successfully processed. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to appear on your statement.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there's anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been completed and no further issues were reported, this case will now be closed. Thank you for contacting support!
